sentences.sContent: The city boasts two excellent museums.
sentences.sCn: 这个城市以拥有两个优秀的博物馆而自豪。
这个协会以拥有3,000名来自世界各地的会员而自豪。

sentences.sContent: It is the charity's proud boast that it has never yet turned anyone away.
sentences.sCn: 该慈善机构自吹自擂，声称从来没有拒绝过任何人。

synos.tran: 自夸；值得夸耀的事物，引以为荣的事物

remMethod.val: 北京的烤鸭(roast duck)值得夸耀(boast)

words.tran: 自夸的；自负的；喜夸耀的
自夸的人；大言不惭的人；吹牛者

trans.tranOther: if a place, object, or organization boasts something, it has something that is very good

trans.tranCn: 自夸，吹嘘；以拥有…而自豪
trans.tranOther: to talk too proudly about your abilities, achievements, or possessions

trans.tranCn: 自吹自擂， 自夸的话
